com.xeoh.android.checkboxgroup

Class CheckBoxGroup<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xeoh.android.checkboxgroup.CheckBoxGroup<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of mapped value

    public class CheckBoxGroup<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    CheckBoxGroup controls multiple CheckBoxes with mapped values.

    In general, CheckBox is used for mapping some value. Using CheckBoxGroup, you can simply map those value and get selected values from it.

    See more on

    • CheckBoxGroup(Map, CheckedChangeListener)
    • put(CheckBox, Object, boolean)
    • remove(CheckBox)
    • getValues()
    • setValues(List)
    • toggleCheckBox(Object)

      • CheckBoxGroup

        public CheckBoxGroup(java.util.Map<android.widget.CheckBox,T> checkBoxes,
                     CheckBoxGroup.CheckedChangeListener<T> listener)
        Constructor of CheckBoxGroup.

        Set mapped value for each CheckBox.

        Parameters:
        checkBoxes - Map of CheckBox to value.
        listener - Listens change of CheckBox

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public void put(android.widget.CheckBox checkBox,
                T value,
                boolean checked)
        Add more CheckBox with mapped value.

        Both checkBox and value should not be added before. If CheckBoxGroup already contains one of checkBox or value, it ignores given parameters.

        Parameters:
        checkBox - CheckBox to add
        value - Mapped value for given checkBox
        checked - checked value of checkbox

      • remove

        public void remove(android.widget.CheckBox checkBox)
        Remove CheckBox with mapped value.
        Parameters:
        checkBox - checkBox to remove

      • getValues

        public java.util.ArrayList<T> getValues()
        Get all selected CheckBoxes value.
        Returns:
        arraylist of selected checkbox's mapped value

      • setValues

        public void setValues(java.util.List<T> options)
        Make Checkbox checked with mapped value.
        Parameters:
        options - list of options to check

      • toggleCheckBox

        public void toggleCheckBox(T value)
        Toggle only on option.
        Parameters:
        value - checkbox's mapped value
